00014 class Plugins_Flickr_DB extends Common_DB
00015 {
00016     static protected $_message;
00017     
00018     /**
00019      * @return void
00020      */
00021     function __construct()
00022     {
00023         parent::__construct();
00024     }
00025 
00026     /**
00027      * @param array $images
00028      * @param User_Accounts_Data $account
00029      * @return Message_Data
00030      */
00031     public static function save(array $images, $account)
00032     {
00033         $auth = Auth::get_instance();
00034         $messageMapper = Message_Mapper::get_instance();
00035 
00036         $aboutMe = unserialize($account->getAuth());
00037 
00038         foreach ($images as $item) {
00039 
00040             if (!isset($item["activities"])) {
00041 
00042                 continue;
00043             }
00044 
00045             $image = $item;
00046             unset($image["activities"]);
00047 
00048             foreach ($item["activities"] as $activity) {
00049 
00050                 self::$_message = new Message_Data();
00051                 self::$_message->setIdU($auth->getuserId())
00052                         ->setidUP($account->getId())
00053                         ->setLink("http://www.flickr.com/photos/".$item["owner"]."/".$item["id"]."/");
00054 
00055                 switch($activity["type"]) {
00056 
00057                    case "fave":
00058 
00059                          self::$_message->setTitle("favorite");
00060                          self::$_message->setRemoteId("fa".$activity["user"].$activity["dateadded"].$image["id"]);
00061 
00062                          break;
00063 
00064                    case "comment":
00065 
00066                            self::$_message->setTitle($activity["_content"]);
00067                            self::$_message->setRemoteId("co".$activity["commentid"]);
00068 
00069                            unset($activity["_content"]);
00070                            unset($activity["commentid"]);
00071 
00072                            break;
00073 
00074                    case "uploaded" :
00075 
00076                            if (isset($activity["photos_uploaded"]) and $activity["photos_uploaded"] == "")
00077                            self::$_message->setTitle($activity["photos_uploaded"]);
00078                            self::$_message->setRemoteId("up".$image["owner"].$image["id"]);
00079                            break;
00080 
00081                    case "app" :
00082 
00083                            self::$_message->setTitle($image["title"]);
00084                            self::$_message->setRemoteId("up".$image["owner"].$image["id"]);
00085                            break;
00086 
00087                    default:
00088 
00089                            continue;
00090                            break;
00091                 }
00092 
00093                 $existingMessages = $messageMapper->find(self::$_message);
00094                 if(count($existingMessages) > 0) {
00095 
00096                     self::$_message = array_shift($existingMessages);
00097                 }
00098 
00099                 $metadata = array(
00100                     "image" => $image,
00101                     "event" => $activity
00102                 );
00103 
00104                 $mine = 0;
00105                 if ($activity["type"] == "app") {
00106 
00107                    $mine = 1;
00108 
00109                 } else if (isset($activity["user"]) and $activity["user"] == $aboutMe["user"]["nsid"]) {
00110 
00111                     $mine = 1;
00112                 }
00113 
00114                 self::$_message->setOwner($mine);
00115 
00116                 if (isset($activity["dateadded"])) {
00117                 
00118                     self::$_message->setPublishDate(date("Y-m-d H:i:s", $activity["dateadded"]));
00119 
00120                 } else {
00121                 
00122                     self::$_message->setPublishDate(date("Y-m-d H:i:s", time()));
00123                 }
00124  
00125                 self::$_message->setData($metadata);
00126 
00127                 $messageMapper->save(self::$_message);
00128             }
00129         }
00130 
00131         return self::$_message;
00132     }
00133 }
